author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE ERICK MOVING INLAND OVER SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...FLOODING RAINS AND HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS CONTINUE...
summary: ...HURRICANE ERICK MOVING INLAND OVER SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...FLOODING RAINS AND HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS CONTINUE... As of 9:00 AM CST Thu Jun 19 the center of Erick was located near 16.7, -98.8 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 980 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary for Hurricane Erick (EP5/EP052025)
